sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function RegistrationForm(){ const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', username:'', password:'', email:'', favoriteGenres:[], favoriteActors:[], preferredLanguage:[], preferredNews:[], }); const handleChange = (e) => { const {name, value, options} = e.target; if(options){ const selectedOptions = []; for(let i = 0; i < options.length; i++){ if(options[i].selected){ selectedOptions += options[i].value; } } setFormData({...formData, [name]: selectedOptions}); } else{ setFormData({...formData, [name]: value}) } } const handleSubmit = async(e) => { e.preventDefault(); const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/register', formData); } return(
) } export default RegistrationForm;
